sen.e: Keihan
Keihan
Keihan

sen.j: 京都市と大阪市のこと。
sen.e: The word "Keihan" means Kyoto City and Osaka City.
The word "Keihan" means Kyoto City and Osaka City.
The word "Keihan" means Kyoto City and Osaka City.

sen.j: 場合によって、以下の地域も含めることもある。
sen.e: In some cases, Keihan includes the following regions:
In some cases, Keihan includes the following regions:
In some cases, Keihan includes the following regions:

sen.j: 京都市と大阪市の間の、主に淀川左岸の大阪府守口市、門真市、寝屋川市、大東市、四條畷市、交野市、枚方市の地域（北河内地区7市）。
sen.e: Moriguchi City, Kadoma City, Neyagawa City, Daito City, Shijonawate City, Katano City, and Hirakata City in Osaka Prefecture, mostly on the left side of the Yodo-gawa River, between Kyoto City and Osaka City (7 cities in the Kitakawachi area).

Moriguchi City, Kadoma City, Neyagawa City, Daito City, Shijonawate City, Katano City, and Hirakata City in Osaka Prefecture, mostly on the left side of the Yodo-gawa River, between Kyoto City and Osaka City (7 cities in the Kitakawachi area).

Moriguchi City, Kadoma City, Neyagawa City, Daito City, Shijonawate City, Katano City, and Hirakata City in Osaka Prefecture, mostly on the left side of the Yodo-gawa River, between Kyoto City and Osaka City (seven cities in the Kitakawachi area).
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 京都府八幡市、宇治市、久世郡久御山町、城陽市、京田辺市、綴喜郡、木津川市、相楽郡を含めることもあるが、基本的には山城地区という。
sen.e: Keihan may include Yawata City, Uji City, Kumiyama-cho in Kuse-gun, Joyo City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun, Kizukawa City, and Soraku-gun in Kyoto Prefecture, but in general, these areas are called the Yamashiro area.

Keihan may include Yawata City, Uji City, Kumiyama-cho in Kuse-gun, Joyo City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun, Kizukawa City, and Soraku-gun in Kyoto Prefecture, but in general, these areas are called the Yamashiro area.

Keihan may include Yawata City, Uji City, Kumiyama-cho in Kuse-gun, Joyo City, Kyotanabe City, Tsuzuki-gun, Kizukawa City, and Soraku-gun in Kyoto Prefecture, but in general, these areas are called the Yamashiro area.

sen.j: 淀川右岸の吹田市、摂津市、茨木市、高槻市、三島郡 (大阪府)島本町、乙訓郡大山崎町、長岡京市、向日市も含めることがあるが、基本的には大阪府側は北摂地区ないしは三島郡 (大阪府)、京都府側は乙訓郡地区と呼ばれている。
sen.e: Keihan may also include Suita City, Settu City, Ibaraki City, Takatsuki City, Shimamoto-cho in Mishima-gun, Oyamazaki-cho in Otokuni-gun, Nagaokakyo City, and Muko City, but generally, the areas in Osaka Prefecture are called either the Hokusetsu area or Mishima-gun while those in Kyoto Prefecture are called the Otokuni-gun area.
sen.cmt: 「三島郡 (大阪府)」の「大阪府」は、英語では、三島郡(新潟県)と読み方が異なるため、訳出しておりません。
sen.e: Keihan may also include Suita City, Settu City, Ibaraki City, Takatsuki City, Shimamoto-cho in Mishima-gun, Oyamazaki-cho in Otokuni-gun, Nagaokakyo City, and Muko City, but generally, the areas in Osaka Prefecture are called either the Hokusetsu area or Mishima-gun while those in Kyoto Prefecture are called the Otokuni-gun area.

Keihan may also include Suita City, Settsu City, Ibaraki City, Takatsuki City, Shimamoto-cho in Mishima-gun (Osaka Prefecture), Oyamazaki-cho in Otokuni-gun, Nagaokakyo City, and Muko City, but generally, the areas in Osaka Prefecture are called either the Hokusetsu area or Mishima-gun (Osaka Prefecture) while those in Kyoto Prefecture are called the Otokuni-gun area.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。（大阪府）を追加しました。

sen.j: 京都市と大阪市を結ぶ私鉄である京阪電気鉄道のこと。
sen.e: The word "Keihan" means Keihan Electric Railway, a private railroad connecting Kyoto City with Osaka City.
The word "Keihan" means Keihan Electric Railway, a private railroad connecting Kyoto City with Osaka City.
The word "Keihan" means Keihan Electric Railway, a private railroad connecting Kyoto City with Osaka City.

sen.j: 一般に「京阪」といえば、上記のような地域名よりも、同社および同社を中核とする京阪グループの各社を指す場合のほうが多い。
sen.e: In general, the word "Keihan" is more often referred to Keihan Electric Railway and each company in the Keihan Group centering on the railroad company than the names of the areas mentioned above.
In general, the word "Keihan" is more often refers to Keihan Electric Railway and each company in the Keihan Group centering on the railroad company than the names of the areas mentioned above.
In general, the word 'Keihan' more often refers to Keihan Electric Railway and each company in the Keihan Group centering on the railroad company than the names of the areas mentioned above.
sen.cmt: 文法を修正しました（is削除）。

sen.j: 詳細については京阪電気鉄道または京阪グループの記事を参照。
sen.e: See the article on Keihan Electric Railway or the Keihan Group for details.
See the article on Keihan Electric Railway or the Keihan Group for details.
See the article on Keihan Electric Railway or the Keihan Group for details.
